window.visible: Player.HasAudio + [[System.IdleTime(60) + String.IsEqual(Skin.String(AutoMusicVisPlaybackDuration),60s) | System.IdleTime(30) + String.IsEqual(Skin.String(AutoMusicVisPlaybackDuration),30s) | System.IdleTime(20) + String.IsEqual(Skin.String(AutoMusicVisPlaybackDuration),20s) | System.IdleTime(15) + String.IsEqual(Skin.String(AutoMusicVisPlaybackDuration),15s) | System.IdleTime(10) + String.IsEqual(Skin.String(AutoMusicVisPlaybackDuration),10s)] | Integer.IsEqual(MusicPlayer.Time,1) + Integer.IsEqual(Playlist.Position(music),1) + Skin.HasSetting(AutoMusicVisStart)] + Skin.HasSetting(AutoMusicVis)
